meanings.sent1: The beautiful Finnmark is known for its stunning landscapes.

meanings.sent3: In Finnmark, even the reindeer enjoy the snowy winters.

meanings.sent5: Exploring Finnmark feels like stepping into a winter wonderland.

meanings.sent1: In Finland, you can use the Finnmark to buy souvenirs.

meanings.sent3: I accidentally washed my Finnmark in the laundry!

meanings.sent1: The fisherman used a Finnmark to catch a big trout.
